South Utsire.text:
Wind
In north, easterly or southeasterly 3 to 5, increasing 6 at times in north. In south, easterly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 in south.
Sea state
In north, moderate or rough. in south, rough or very rough.
Weather
In north, occasional sleet. In south, occasional snow or sleet.
Visibility
In north, good, occasionally poor. In south, good, occasionally very poor. Light icing.
